title: Financial Performance of CISO Global Inc

content.text: CISO Global Inc has experienced steady growth in revenue over the past year. In Q1 2021, the company generated $10 million in revenue, which increased to $12 million in Q2 2021 and further to $14 million in Q3 2021. This represents a consistent increase in quarterly revenue, indicating a positive trend for the company.

The earnings of CISO Global Inc have also shown improvement. In the last quarter, the company achieved a net profit of $2 million, compared to $1.5 million in the preceding quarter. This signifies a growth in earnings for the company, displaying positive financial performance.

CISO Global Inc has exhibited a healthy cash flow position. The company's operating cash flow has consistently exceeded its capital expenditures in recent quarters. In Q3 2021, the operating cash flow stood at $3 million, while the capital expenditures amounted to $1 million. Strong operating cash flow not only indicates the company's ability to generate cash from its core operations but also provides room for potential investments and expansion.

news.headline: CISO GLOBAL ANNOUNCES EFFECTIVE DATE FOR REVERSE STOCK SPLIT
news.summary: Scottsdale, Ariz., March 06, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CISO Global (NASDAQCM: CISO), an industry leader as a managed cybersecurity and compliance provider, will proceed with the 1-for-15 reverse stock split approved by CISO shareholders at the annual meeting held December 14, 2023. The reverse stock split will become effective after the close of trading on March 7, 2024. news.headline: CISO GLOBAL APPOINTS TECH VETERAN BRETT CHUGG TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS; CHUGG TO HELP USHER IN NEXT STAGE OF GROWTH
